text:
Hello,
I'm Alex Dupont, and I'm student in science of education. Why I decided to study the education ? I would became schoolteacher. This choice born with a lot of reasons.
To begin, I think that the education is the base of the society. That's why I want to became schoolteacher. The transmission of culture, values and knowledge is extremely important for all of children and peoples. I would help children for our evolution in the life.
Then, I had manies incredibles teachers in my childhood, they are sources of inspiration to me. They were comprehensive, they explained the lessons with pedagogy. It was very encouraging for us ! I think the attitude of the teachers is very very important for the student, because when the professor is encouraging the childrens believe on us ! In my opinion, a child must be happy and confient when he go to school ! It's essential to make progress. When I remember this moment of class, I want to be the same professor like us with my futurs students.
To finish, I love take care of children. This summer I practice babysitting and I very appreciate look for diverses activities, games for us, it was very enriching !
